name: Harvard Public Art & Culture Tour
description: Discover a new world of public art in and around Allston and Cambridge! Choose a self-guided tour and learn the captivating stories behind a variety of artworks and their artists. You’ll explore big names in art and architecture, thought-provoking contemporary installations, longstanding cultural institutions—and be amazed as hidden gems reveal themselves in plain sight!

location.name: Multiple locations in Harvard Square, Cambridge and along Western Avenue, Allston
